Question
========

You do a survey on birth weight. You make a distinction between boys and girls and for that you have the following data (in kg) of the children selected by random sampling)from from all babies born last year.

  --------- ------ ------ ------ ------ ------ ------ ------ Boys 2.63 2.81 2.95 2.99 3.08 3.18 Girls 1.91 2.59 2.81 2.86 2.95 2.99 3.04 --------- ------ ------ ------ ------ ------ ------ ------

* Ource: statistics for secondary education -- Hasselt University \ What is the standard deviation of the boys' birth weight? Round to three decimal places.

Solution
========

The correct answer is: 0.196
